entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:18 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 09:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %

Wind: SW 15 km/h

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
